name: Ocean Swim Prototype
description:
Your vessel has sunken in the mythical infested waters of the ocean. Luckily a fishing boat has seen your distress flags and had come to your aid! Swim to safety but avoid the beasts below wishing you a watery demise.

This is an experimental prototype made for a Jam with the prompts:
enemy - gore - mythology
and a one-input constraint

Hold space to swim!

available and tested on Windows and Mac
